    Hello world!

    I am a Combustion & CFD Expert at Wärtsilä Finland .

    I received my PhD from Aalto University, Finland in 2021 and my MSc. from Middle East Technical University, Turkey in 2017.

    My research interests are Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD), scientific computing, numerical combustion and CFD code development.
